column1: In this master’s in applied statistics, you’ll learn statistical analysis and apply it to a variety of industries, including insurance, marketing, government, health care, and more.95%Outcome Rate of RIT Graduates from this degree$98K Average First-Year Salary of RIT Graduates from this degree34%Employment growth rateExpected for statisticians by 2026, four times faster than the overall labor market30%Merit scholarshipAverage award given to accepted students
